name: Seismic Fissure
effect: 10-ft.-by-80-ft. fissure in the earth, 40 ft. deep
text: With a thrust of tectonic energy, you split the earth. Each creature standing in the area where the fissure opens must succeed at a Reflex saving throw to avoid falling into the rift. Those standing adjacent to the fissure when it is created must succeed at a Reflex save or be knocked prone by tremors. This spell is effective only when cast on an area of dirt, earth, sand, or stone.
effect_zh: 10英尺×80英尺的地面裂缝，40英尺深
text_zh: 在地质能量的推动下，你能够撕裂大地。每个站在裂缝打开区域的生物必须通过反射豁免检定来避免落入裂缝。当裂缝形成时，站在裂缝旁边的人必须通过反射豁免检定，否则就会被震动击倒，陷入俯卧。此法术只有在由泥、土、沙子或石头构成的区域施放时才有效。
